Weapons.Name: Attack Boost
Weapons.Desc: Increases attack power.

Weapons.Name: Offensive Guard
Weapons.Desc: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed guard.

Weapons.Name: Critical Eye
Weapons.Desc: Increases affinity.

Weapons.Name: Critical Boost
Weapons.Desc: Increases the damage of critical hits.
Weapons.Lv1: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 28%.
Weapons.Lv2: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 31%.
Weapons.Lv3: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 34%.
Weapons.Lv4: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 37%.
Weapons.Lv5: Increases damage dealt by critical hits to 40%.

Weapons.Name: Critical Draw
Weapons.Desc: Increases affinity when performing draw attacks. (Not effective while riding.)

Weapons.Name: Fire Attack
Weapons.Desc: Increases fire element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Weapons.Name: Water Attack
Weapons.Desc: Increases water element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Weapons.Name: Ice Attack
Weapons.Desc: Increases ice element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Weapons.Name: Thunder Attack
Weapons.Desc: Increases thunder element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Weapons.Name: Dragon Attack
Weapons.Desc: Increases dragon element attack power. (Elemental attack power has a maximum limit.)

Weapons.Name: Poison Attack
Weapons.Desc: Increases the rate of poison buildup. (Poison buildup has a maximum limit.)

Weapons.Name: Paralysis Attack
Weapons.Desc: Increases the rate of paralysis buildup. (Paralysis buildup has a maximum limit.)

Weapons.Name: Sleep Attack
Weapons.Desc: Increases the rate of sleep buildup. (Sleep buildup has a maximum limit.)

Weapons.Name: Blast Attack
Weapons.Desc: Increases the rate of blast buildup. (Blast buildup has a maximum limit.)

Weapons.Name: Critical Element
Weapons.Desc: Increases elemental damage (fire, water, thunder, ice, dragon) when landing critical hits.

Weapons.Name: Critical Status
Weapons.Desc: Increases abnormal status effects (paralysis, poison, sleep, blast) when landing critical hits.

Weapons.Name: Charge Master
Weapons.Desc: Increases element power and status buildup for charged attacks.

Weapons.Name: Handicraft
Weapons.Desc: Extends the weapon sharpness gauge. However, it will not increase the gauge past its maximum.

Weapons.Name: Razor Sharp
Weapons.Desc: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness.

Weapons.Name: Protective Polish
Weapons.Desc: Weapon sharpness does not decrease for a set time after sharpening.

Weapons.Name: Mind's Eye
Weapons.Desc: Your attacks are deflected less and deal more damage to hard targets.

Weapons.Name: Bludgeoner
Weapons.Desc: Increases attack power when your weapon sharpness is low.

Weapons.Name: Master's Touch
Weapons.Desc: Prevents your weapon from losing sharpness during critical hits.

Weapons.Name: Normal Shots
Weapons.Desc: Increases the attack power of Normal Ammo, normal arrows, and Flying Swallow Shot.

Weapons.Name: Piercing Shots
Weapons.Desc: Increases the attack of the bowgun's Pierce Ammo, and the bow's Dragon Piercer and Thousand Dragons.

Weapons.Name: Spread/Power Shots
Weapons.Desc: Increases the attack of the bowgun's Spread Ammo and the bow's Power Shots and Quick Shots.

Weapons.Name: Ballistics
Weapons.Desc: Extends the range in which ammo and arrows have maximum power.

Weapons.Name: Rapid Fire Up
Weapons.Desc: Improves light bowgun rapid fire.

Weapons.Name: Opening Shot
Weapons.Desc: Increases the bowgun's reload speed and increases the power of bullets when fully loaded.

Weapons.Name: Tetrad Shot
Weapons.Desc: Increases affinity of bowgun ammo/ coatings from the fourth shot and attack of the fourth and sixth shots.

Weapons.Name: Special Ammo Boost
Weapons.Desc: Increases the power of the bowgun's special ammo, and the bow's Dragon Piercer, Thousand Dragons, and Tracer.

Weapons.Name: Poison Functionality
Weapons.Desc: Allows you to apply poison coatings.

Weapons.Name: Para Functionality
Weapons.Desc: Allows you to apply paralysis coatings.

Weapons.Name: Sleep Functionality
Weapons.Desc: Allows you to apply sleep coatings.

Weapons.Name: Blast Functionality
Weapons.Desc: Allows you to apply blast coatings.

Weapons.Name: Exhaust Functionality
Weapons.Desc: Allows you to apply exhaust coatings.

Weapons.Name: Focus
Weapons.Desc: Increases the fill rate for weapons with gauges and the charge rate for weapons with charge attacks.

Weapons.Name: Power Prolonger
Weapons.Desc: Allows long swords, dual blades, insect glaives, switch axes, and charge blades to stay powered up longer.

Weapons.Name: Punishing Draw
Weapons.Desc: Adds a stun effect to draw attacks and slightly increases attack power. (Not effective while riding.)

Weapons.Name: Slugger
Weapons.Desc: Makes it easier to stun monsters.

Weapons.Name: Stamina Thief
Weapons.Desc: Increases certain attacks' ability to exhaust monsters.

Weapons.Name: Artillery
Weapons.Desc: Strengthens explosive attacks like shells, Wyvern's Fire, charge blade phial attacks, and Sticky Ammo.

Weapons.Name: Rapid Morph
Weapons.Desc: Increases switch speed and power for switch axes and charge blades.

Weapons.Name: Horn Maestro
Weapons.Desc: Increases the effect duration of hunting horn melodies. (Effect lost when you change weapons.)

Weapons.Name: Charge Up
Weapons.Desc: Increases your power to induce stun when you hit a monster with a hammer's charged attack.

Weapons.Name: Airborne
Weapons.Desc: Increases the damage caused by jumping attacks.

Weapons.Name: Poison Duration Up
Weapons.Desc: Extends the duration of your poison's effect on monsters.

Weapons.Name: Guard
Weapons.Desc: Reduces knockbacks and stamina depletion when guarding.

Weapons.Name: Guard Up
Weapons.Desc: Allows you to guard against ordinarily unblockable attacks.

Weapons.Name: Load Shells
Weapons.Desc: Improves reloading, and increases the gunlance's shell capacity and charge blade's phial capacity.

Weapons.Name: Speed Sharpening
Weapons.Desc: Speeds up weapon sharpening when using a whetstone.

Weapons.Name: Slicked Blade
Weapons.Desc: Temporarily increases affinity when wet or when inflicted with bubbleblight. (Wet and bubbleblight effects stack.)

Weapons.Name: Whiteflame Torrent
Weapons.Desc: Chance to deal additional damage after landing an attack.

Equip.Resentment: Increases attack when you have recoverable damage (the red portion of your Health Gauge).
Equip.Adrenaline Rush: Temporarily increases attack power after executing a perfectly-timed evade just as a monster attacks.
Equip.Peak Performance: Increases attack when your health is full.
Equip.Counterstrike: Temporarily increases attack power after being knocked back.
Equip.Weakness Exploit: Increases the affinity of attacks that exploit a monster's weak points and wounds.
Equip.Maximum Might: Increases affinity if stamina is kept full for a period of time.
Equip.Convert Element: After taking elemental damage, temporarily grants you dragon element effects. (Cooldown after effect ends.)
Equip.Defense Boost: Increases defense. Also improves resistances at higher levels.
Equip.Divine Blessing: Has a predetermined chance of reducing the damage you take.
Equip.Fire Resistance: Increases fire resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Equip.Water Resistance: Increases water resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Equip.Thunder Resistance: Increases thunder resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Equip.Ice Resistance: Increases ice resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Equip.Dragon Resistance: Increases dragon resistance. Also improves defense at higher levels.
Equip.Blight Resistance: Grants protection against all elemental blights.
Equip.Bind Resistance: Grants protection against webbed status and frostblight.
Equip.Adaptability: Grants protection against environmental damage, such as from heat or cold.
Equip.Recovery Up: Increases the amount recovered when restoring health.
Equip.Recovery Speed: Speeds healing of recoverable damage (the red portion of the Health Gauge).
Equip.Survival Expert: Extra health is recovered from environmental interactables.
Equip.Constitution: Reduces stamina depletion when evading, blocking, or doing certain other actions.
Equip.Marathon Runner: Slows down stamina depletion for actions that continuously drain stamina (such as dashing).
Equip.Hunger Resistance: Reduces maximum stamina depletion over time.
Equip.Agitator: Increases attack power and affinity when large monsters become enraged.
Equip.Latent Power: Temporarily increases affinity and reduces stamina depletion when certain conditions are met.
Equip.Heroics: Increases attack power and defense when health drops to 35% or lower.
Equip.Burst: Continuously landing hits gradually increases attack and elemental attack. (Amount increased depends on weapon.)
Equip.Foray: Increases attack power and affinity against large monsters affected by poison or paralysis.
Equip.Flayer: Makes it easier to inflict wounds. Upon inflicting enough damage, also deals additional non-elemental damage.
Equip.Partbreaker: Makes it easier to break large monster parts, and increases damage dealt when destroying a wound with a Focus Strike.
Equip.Coalescence: Temporarily increases elemental attack power and status effects after recovering from blights or abnormal status.
Equip.Ambush: Temporarily increases damage to large monsters with a successful Sneak Attack.
Equip.Antivirus: Once infected, makes it easier to overcome the Frenzy and increases affinity if cured.
Equip.Elemental Absorption: After taking elemental damage, temporarily grants you element effects. (Cooldown after effect ends)
Equip.Self-Improvement: Attack and defense increase as time passes while on a quest. (The maximum is reached after 30 minutes.)
Equip.Evade Window: Extends the invulnerability period when evading.
Equip.Earplugs: Grants protection from large monsters' roars.
Equip.Flinch Free: Prevents knockbacks and other reactions to small damage.
Equip.Intimidator: Reduces the chance small monsters will attack after spotting you. (Has no effect on certain monsters.)
Equip.Aquatic/Oilsilt Mobility: Grants resistance against impairments to mobility while in water, oilsilt, or streams.
Equip.Shock Absorber: Disables damage reactions when you hit a friend or when a friend hits you.
Equip.Leap of Faith: Allows you to do a dive-evade when facing towards large monsters and extends the dive-evade distance.
Equip.Jump Master: Prevents attacks from knocking you back during a jump.
Equip.Cliffhanger: Decreases stamina depletion when climbing on vines.
Equip.Wide-Range: Allows the effects of certain items to also affect nearby allies.
Equip.Tool Specialist: Reduces the recharge time for specialized tools.
Equip.Bombardier: Increases the damage of explosive items.
Equip.Mushroomancer: Lets you digest mushrooms that would otherwise be inedible and gain their advantageous effects.
Equip.Item Prolonger: Extends the duration of some item effects.
Equip.Free Meal: Gives you a predetermined chance of consuming a food or drink item for free.
Equip.Blindsider: Improves the effectiveness of flash attacks and items.
Equip.Botanist: Increases the quantity of herbs and other consumable items you gather.
Equip.Geologist: Increases the number of items you gain at gathering points.
Equip.Entomologist: The bodies of small insect monsters won't be destroyed, allowing them to be carved.
Equip.Outdoorsman: Improves fishing, grilling, and transporting abilities.
